page.title: 10Apedale
page.content: On Loomer Road there is an industrial estate with factories such as the oatcake factory, a plant-hire firm which hires out tractors and trailers, two printing firms, cement works, a public service agency and G.T.Products which sells equipment to retail businesses. Loomer Road leads into rough agricultural land which in the near future is going to be used for opencast mining. This place is called Apedale. Apedale also is a wood consisting of both deciduous and coniferous trees. In Apedale there are five concrete shelters which may have been entrances to old mineshafts. To make them safer a fence should be placed round them. The northern area of Apedale is industrial and there is still a mine being worked.
